subject: Add Git Analytics Reporting System
body:
- scripts/extract.js: Node.js extraction script with git log parsing,
  conventional commit detection, keyword-based type fallback, and
  structured JSON output
- scripts/extract.sh: Shell wrapper for easier usage
- dashboard/index.html: Static analytics dashboard with Chart.js
  - Timeline: daily commit chart, recent commits list
  - Progress: monthly volume, cumulative growth, feature vs fix trends
  - Contributors: commits and lines by author
  - Security: highlighted security-related commits
  - Types: pie chart and percentage breakdown
- Updated .gitignore to exclude generated reports/
- Updated docs with usage documentation
